Table1.News title: New limited stay at home order
Table1.News content: COVID-19 is increasing at alarming rates in California and we all need to do our part to stop the surge. Effective November 21, stop non-essential activities between 10:00 pm to 5:00 am in counties in the Widespread (purple) tier.

Table1.News title: Blueprint for a Safer Economy update
Table1.News content: California is responding to rapidly rising case rates with an updated tier assignment framework.
California has released guidance for people traveling into and out of the state.
